DOC.brief_summary: - The purpose study find whether combine short course chemotherapy ( Fludarabine , Mitoxantrone Rituximab ) follow Zevalin effective treating relapse mantle cell lymphoma . - The secondary purpose study determine safety evaluate whether additional benefit Zevalin therapy follow chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Chemotherapy Followed Zevalin Relapsed Mantle Cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: - Patients receive fludarabine ( day 1-3 ) , mitoxantrone ( day 1 ) , rituximab ( day 1 ) 28-day cycle . - Patients undergo CT scan bone marrow biopsy two cycle . Unless cancer progress , patient receive Zevalin study treatment . - Blood count take every week 12 week . After 12 week , CT scan bone marrow biopsy perform . - Long-term followup 4 year . Physical exam blood work perform every 3 month first two year . Following , physical exam blood work every 6 month another two year . CT scan bone marrow biopsy every 6 month 4 year followup period .
